1388650.name: League Of Enthusiastic Losers
1388650.description:
Vitya and Volodya are two best friends who are faced with all sorts of problems, the main one of which is eviction from the apartment for non-payment. Friends do not have enough money and they decide to look for treasure, in parallel doing their daily activities. Many adventures and new unexpected meetings await them.

League of Enthusiastic Losers is a reflective adventure game about experiencing yourself, looking for happiness, self-care, and not giving up contrary to what others think. Immerse yourself in a slow-flowing but true story, of the nostalgic journey to the 90s.
